EmailTemplate.subject: Your Quarterly Airline Newsletter
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Portal <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> | Contact Us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/contact-us]]> | View in browser <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Forward to a friend <[[{{system.forwardToFriendLink}}]]>
Check out what’s happening in the second quarter of our Honeywell Aerospace Airline Newsletter. New UV Treatment System
This battery-powered UVC device can fit anywhere a person can go, making it the perfect choice for business jets, helicopters, concert halls, stadiums and so much more. Watch our webinar <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/11/honeywell-uv-treatment-wand-webinar?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=uv+wand]]> for an exclusive first look.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/11/honeywell-uv-treatment-wand-webinar?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=uv+wand]]> Join Honeywell In-Person at MRO Americas 2021!
Join us <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/04/mro-americas-2021?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=mro+americas]]> at the Orange Country Convention Center in Orlando, Florida on April 27—29, for an in-person look into new products and services from Honeywell Aerospace. We can’t wait to see you at booth #1470.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events/2021/04/mro-americas-2021?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=mro+americas]]> Partnering for success in the recovery – A message from the Vice President of Airlines APAC, Andrew Wong
"The pandemic has led to a significant impact on aviation industry and many of us have had pivoted our resources to continue our operation with maximum cost efficiency. A reduction in flight hours has resulted in some parked aircraft in the past year and in some cases has expedited the fleet retirement plan. However, we all hope that there is light at the end of the tunnel as vaccination programs begin and progress in many countries and international travel soon resumes. In anticipation of flying activities gradually increasing, Honeywell is committed to support operators to prepare aircraft for re-entry into service efficiently. Our customer core teams are always ready to listen to your operational needs and would love to discuss on the solutions that would help to minimize cost of returning aircraft to services, as well as to optimize your operation cost. Please do not hesitate to talk to us and share with us your operating plans. We look forward to be your valuable partner, working hand in hand to assist you in achieving maximum operational efficiency and cost savings during this challenging period." <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/pages/increase-time-on-wing-while-lowering-fuel-burn?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=131-9a+hem]]> <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2021/02/the-2020-channel-partner-of-the-year-awards?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=channel+partner+]]>
EPCOR - Regional Channel Partner of the Year - EMEAI <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2021/02/the-2020-channel-partner-of-the-year-awards?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=channel+partner+]]>
This award recognizes EPCOR for their unwavering commitment to supporting Honeywell products and services in the airlines market. As part of Air France/KLM Engineering & Maintenance, EPCOR's understanding of what is important for an airline was vital given the market conditions in 2020. EPCOR had outstanding YOY growth and a dedication to Channel Partnership principles, stocking materials in anticipation of marketing demand.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2021/02/the-2020-channel-partner-of-the-year-awards?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=channel+partner+]]>
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2021/02/honeywell-engineers-help-airbus-300-freighters-fly-into-the-future?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=airbus+blog]]>
Honeywell Engineers Help Airbus <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2021/02/honeywell-engineers-help-airbus-300-freighters-fly-into-the-future?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=airbus+blog]]>
Airbus and UPS team up with Honeywell to modernize their A300 fleet with the Next-Generation Flight Management System.
Listen to the podcast, here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/events?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=newsletter-january]]>.
Learn more <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/blogs/2021/02/honeywell-engineers-help-airbus-300-freighters-fly-into-the-future?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=airbus+blog]]> Technical Support – The Hub Newly Released Videos
- How to Find Product Reliability Updates <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=SirtJ8ukosw&feature=youtu.be&utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=tech+updates]]> - Enabling High Efficiency Mode on the 131-9A APU <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=iEdoj4MvAiE&feature=youtu.be&utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=131-9a+video]]> - RDR-4000 On-Wing Fault Isolation <[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?app=desktop&v=BFHtCNUUo7A&feature=youtu.be&utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=rdr-4000]]>
To see all videos go to the Honeywell Help and Support Channel <[[https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCBEL6ouNV_LN5lEpYRujMTg]]>on Youtube. Honeywell Knowledge Articles
Did you know that you have the chance to fix your issue or find readily available troubleshooting instructions by typing only some key words using Honeywell's Knowledge Articles?
B737NG - 131-9B APU - Borescope Inspection Port Repair <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/secure/services-and-support/support-center/technical-support/technical-solutions/article-detail.ka_000039282?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=21_airline_newsletter&utm_content=tech+article]]> Honeywell TechConnects
TechConnect forums are a way for Honeywell’s Technical Support to interface with our customer on topics important to you. They include onsite visits, web meeting or even just a phone call. Last year, Honeywell Global Technical Operations held over 2600 TechConnect meetings. We are planning for over 3000 TechConnects in 2021. The Hub
Did you know you can always get technical support, 24/7/365 by contacting the Hub for assistance with any Honeywell aircraft system?
Honeywell Hub Contact Card While you are here, why not take a moment to opt-in <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>. We want to be sure you don’t miss out on the latest news, industry insight and special offers from Honeywell. <[[https://www.facebook.com/HoneywellAero]]> <[[https://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace]]> <[[https://twitter.com/honeywell_aero]]> <[[https://www.instagram.com/honeywell_aero/]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellAviation]]> <[[https://www.youtube.com/user/HoneywellDefense]]>
